name: Outro
_source: speak;Sal;You! Talk!|What is going on here?|Monsters, Mondsorians?
speak;Sages;Hardly a difference between the two, if you ask me.
speak;Septimus;Heh, you have... no clue?|Good, I can die in... peace...
speak;Septimus;Maybe... I too will become a... revenant...
speak;Sages;Seems we ignored the sewer stench and critters...
speak;Sal;We should be able to exit around here, this is grossing me out.
speak;Sages;Don't you wanna take this tome first?
speak;Sal;Use dark magic?|It's been so long...
speak;Sages;I'm sure the whole 'evil' magic thing is nonsense.|It's the user who is really good or evil.
speak;Sal;I suppose you're right...|I'll give it a go.
speak;Sal;I didn't want to see... those things again.
speak;Sal;My father fled Aurelia for... dabbling in necromancy.
speak;Sages;And you were accepted here, right?
speak;Sal;Well, not exactly.|He was still hunted down and killed.|Really, I'm not surprised. It's a crime against life itself!
speak;Sages;Hm, do they think, or feel, like we do?
speak;Sal;I don't know...|But I don't care to know, just thinking about it...
speak;Sal;Oh! Your father...|I don't think they'd debase his Majesty like that... for now.
speak;Sages;Jav! What did they do to you...?
speak;Snow;Prince Sages! Thankfully you're safe!|His Majesty warped us away... He wishes to take the blame for this!
speak;Sages;No... but he didn't do anything!
speak;Snow;He wishes to keep you safe...
speak;Sal;Uhm, can we move? We need to get Javi somewhere safer, quickly!
speak;Sages;Good idea, we might need to head back to Grahment...|Assuming Monsdor haven't done any damage...
